data.actual_result: List is scrolled down to where you left off on other server
data.expected_result: To see top of the member list
data.short_description: Scrolling down in one groups member list bugs the next list you look at by scrolling down the same amount
data.steps_to_repro: - Goto a servers member list - exit list and goto an other server and scroll down there member list (all the way or just a bit) - exit out of list and go back to previous server's member list
